abstract: In a fresh sign of China’s financial strength, a leap in the shares of the Industrial & Commercial Bank of China on Monday made it the world’s biggest bank by market capitalization, overtaking Citigroup.
lead_paragraph: In a fresh sign of China’s financial strength, a leap in the shares of the Industrial & Commercial Bank of China on Monday made it the world’s biggest bank by market capitalization, overtaking Citigroup.

headline.main: China’s ICBC Overtakes Citi as World’s Largest Bank
